7kjp4p3k.name: Individual Normal Time Attack
7kjp4p3k.rules:
- NG+ (Normal difficulty) time trials. 

- Goes by In-Game Time (IGT) on the submission form. No Real Time needed. Include milliseconds in submissions.

- The time needs to be clearly visible. We recommend the player to show the finished time as new personnal best after the colossus death cutscene, by praying to the idol.
